Original:
現在心情好，所以臨時起意寫下感想～
12/24當天與朋友約來陳三慶祝平安夜快樂，這間店是我的清單之一，可惜一直沒有機會光臨，剛好藉著這次一探究竟！
由於我先早到，進店內時只有一位可愛的女店員（後來知道人家叫小渲）她很熱情的歡迎我入座，也有向我介紹菜單酒單，還問我要不要不等朋友了先開喝（笑）之後陸續來了其他客人，剛好也有位女生在等朋友，於是我們彼此就閒聊起來，過不久她的朋友來了，我的朋友還在路上（遠在天邊的友人～）然後店家好心的把我們安排坐一起哈哈哈，大家就開始認識新朋友了（誒嘿）聊著聊著朋友也剛好到了，我們兩人一共喝了不少酒水（在此就不細說，怕被認出.jpg）此外隱藏版炒飯很好吃、炸薯條搭配番茄醬根本絕配（但原本就有灑上胡椒鹽，單吃也美味）滷味拼盤配上特製辣椒醬完全超級下飯啊！
害我最後吃的超飽哈哈哈😆
奇怪了不是來喝酒的咩？

總結，陳三是個好地方，
老闆娘看似高冷個性豪爽且愛爬山，
今年的平安夜來陳三度過是最棒的選擇了！

祝福店家生意興榮，明年我再來唷～
EN:
Now I am in a good mood, so I feel temporarily writing down ~
12/24 On the day, I came to Chen San to celebrate the happy night with friends. This shop is one of my lists. Unfortunately, I have never had a chance to come, just to find out this time!
Since I arrive early first, there is only one cute female clerk when I enter the store (later knowing that people are called Xiaodi). She welcomes me to the seat very enthusiastically, and also introduce me to the menu wine list. I also asked me if I do After drinking (laughs), other guests came one after another. Just happened to have a girl waiting for friends, so we chatted with each other. Soon, her friends came, and my friend was still on the road (friends far away from the sky ~) The store carefully arranged us to sit together hahaha, and everyone began to meet new friends (eh hey) Talking about friends, and the two of us drank a lot of drinks (let's not talk about it here, afraid of being afraid of being expelled, for fear of being being expelled. Recognize. Jpg) In addition, the hidden version of the fried rice is delicious, fried fries with tomato sauce are fundamental (but there are originally sprinkled with pepper and pepper, and it is delicious.) Looming platter with special chili sauce is completely super meals!
Moving me the last super full hahaha 😆
Strange, aren't you here to drink?

To sum up, Chen San is a good place,
The boss looks like a high -cold personality and loves to climb the mountain,
This year's Christmas Eve is the best choice!

I wish the shop a prosperous business, I will come again next year ~

Original:
可以感受到客人彼此間很自然的熱絡，應該是適合來聊天交友的餐酒館。

不過食物我沒有很滿意，點了絲瓜拉麵跟紅燒獅子頭麵，絲瓜拉麵的湯頭大多是白胡椒的味道，紅燒獅子頭湯讓我想到排骨酥湯的清淡無勾芡版。

同伴點的金萱茶沒有泡開，就只是一杯熱水的感覺，但我們只想嚐嚐餐點味道，所以就沒有再告知 bartender 替我們處理（不好意思！）。

滷大腸頭是好吃的，金沙豆腐沒有入味，吃起來感覺只是熱豆腐裹上鹹蛋，也是有點可惜。

我不會推薦朋友來用餐，不過來喝酒交朋友應該還是會推。
EN:
You can feel the natural enthusiasm of guests with each other. It should be a restaurant that is suitable for chatting and making friends.

However, I am not very satisfied with the food. I ordered the rally ramen and the braised lion head. Most of the soup heads of loofah ramen are flavored by white pepper. The braised lion head soup reminds me of the light and thicker version of the ribs.

Jin Xuan tea at the companion is not soaked, it just feels like a cup of hot water, but we just want to taste the taste of the meal, so we did not tell Bartender for dealing with us (sorry!).

The halogen's large intestine is delicious. Sands tofu didn't taste it. It feels just a pity that it tastes just wrapped with salted eggs.

I don't recommend friends to dine, but I should still push to make friends.

Original: 昨晚第一次和朋友去，場地不大，但應有盡有，餐點和酒單品項都十分豐富，而且令人驚艷，牛肉乾拌麵的滋味不輸專業牛肉麵店，紅白酒也很好入口，淡淡的酒香，卻繚繞在我的舌尖和咽喉，久久不曾退去，燈光和音樂也都恰到好處，微醺的光線和情緒交織在一起，我的靈魂彷彿被抽離，店員的態度讓彼此之前沒有距離感，在冷雨夜中，難夠在這樣充滿溫度的店家，喝上一杯，暢談工作和人生，夫復何求？
